info.author: Erik Max Francis
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
CSBuddy is a tool designed to help Counter-Strike server owners,
    particularly those running AdminMod.  It does two things: First,
    it maintains a queryable database of all players that have been
    seen on the server; and second, it filters the raw logs of a
    Counter-Strike server and distills them into a single CSBuddy log
    which shows only high-level activity such as excessive friendly
    fire incidents, admin activity, and players complaining about
    misbehavior or saying suspicious things.

    This tool is built upon an included Counter-Strike log file parser
    which is provided in a simple derivable class.
info.keywords: CounterStrike, Counter-Strike, CS, log file parser, log file monitor
info.name: CSBuddy
info.summary: A Counter-Strike server log file monitor and administration tool
info.html_description:
CSBuddy is a tool designed to help Counter-Strike server owners,

particularly those running AdminMod. It does two things: First, it maintains a queryable database of all players that have been seen on the server; and second, it filters the raw logs of a Counter-Strike server and distills them into a single CSBuddy log which shows only high-level activity such as excessive friendly fire incidents, admin activity, and players complaining about misbehavior or saying suspicious things.

This tool is built upon an included Counter-Strike log file parser which is provided in a simple derivable class.
